sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Page, Navbar, Link, NavLeft, NavRight, NavTitle, List, ListInput, Button,Block,Col,Row } from 'framework7-react'; const DoRegister = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const app = this.$f7; const formData = app.form.convertToData(e.target) app.dialog.alert(JSON.stringify(formData)) } export default () => ( User Authentication menu DoRegister(e)}> )
